description.p: visualization_msgs is a set of messages used by higher level packages, such as rviz, that deal in visualization-specific data.

The main messages in visualization_msgs is visualization_msgs/Marker. The marker message is used to send visualization "markers" such as boxes, spheres, arrows, lines, etc. to a visualization environment such as rviz. See the rviz tutorial rviz tutorials for more information.

rosbuild2.msgs: msg/InteractiveMarker.msg msg/InteractiveMarkerControl.msg msg/InteractiveMarkerFeedback.msg msg/ImageMarker.msg msg/MarkerArray.msg msg/Marker.msg
